definition: from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor

sentences.english: Few friends has she made since she came into this school last year.
sentences.chinese: 自从去年她来到这个学校，没交几个朋友。

sentences.english: The land has appreciated greatly since the new railway was buit.
sentences.chinese: 自从新铁路筑成以后，这块地的价值大为增高。

sentences.english: He tried to avoid meeting me like plague since he had resigned.
sentences.chinese: 自从辞职后，他就如避蛇蝎般地躲着我。

sentences.english: Yes, since I had it , the attack was stopped.
sentences.chinese: 有用，自从我吃药后发作就停止了。

sentences.english: We have lived in Linqing since we came here.
sentences.chinese: 自从我们到这儿以来，我们就一直住在临清。

sentences.english: It's been non-stop football for me since I started when I was 17.
sentences.chinese: 自从我17岁参加正式比赛以来还从未停过工。

sentences.english: My english performance is better than one day by one day since I joined HJ English.
sentences.chinese: 自从加入庐江之后，我的英语成绩一天比一天好。

sentences.english: Since China gone to the slavery society, the ideas of "filial piety" had bud in China .
sentences.chinese: 自从进入奴隶社会，中国就有了“孝”观念的萌芽。

sentences.english: Nearly 30,000 people have been killed since the campaign began.
sentences.chinese: 自从缉毒战开始以来，已有近3万人丧生。

sentences.english: Jack got the cold shoulder from his classmates after he double-crossed his best friend.
sentences.chinese: 自从杰克出卖了他最好的朋友后，同班同学都冷落他。

sentences.english: Ever since armies began dressing in Western-style uniforms, men around the world have adapted Western-style work clothes.
sentences.chinese: 自从军队开始穿上西装，世上的男人已经接受了西装。

sentences.english: It has been 60 years since the country was divided by the civil war.
sentences.chinese: 自从国内战争这个国家一分为二以来，已经60年了。

sentences.english: His career has gone from strength to strength ever since and he is now the team's captain and its lynchpin.
sentences.chinese: 生涯已由实力自从和他现在是该队的队长及其甚殷。

sentences.english: AZe Jackie since back, the whole portrait missing changed a similar.
sentences.chinese: 呵责杰姬自从失踪回来后，整个人像变了一个似的。

sentences.english: When the first paraglider appeared, People's dream came true.
sentences.chinese: 自从飞行伞出现后，人们的这一愿望得以实现。

sentences.english: I have watched Conan since like 10th grade.
sentences.chinese: 好像自从10年级开始我就在看柯南的表演了。

definition: to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards
the last few years/last several years/recent years
straight (in a straight line)/continuously/always/from the beginning of ... up to .../all along
